x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/appointmentresponse-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/AppointmentResponse \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"AppointmentResponse","id":"74c1c386-627c-475c-acbc-7f523e9a63ad","appointment":{"reference":"Appointment/example","display":"Brian MRI results discussion"},"actor":{"reference":"Patient/example","display":"Peter James Chalmers"},"participantStatus":"accepted","meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:14.364+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
